name: Teachings of Elegance
description: Talent Level-Up material.  Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.  Elegance brooks no flattery, and the elegant are ever noble. They are like thesea eagles who soar on high to contend with the resounding storms. They willnot cater to philistine vulgarity, as one would not cast a flower crown intothe mud, staining its dignity.
